settings.title: Modern Custom Pet Products
settings.text: We're two people who are passionate about pets. We want to allow pet owners to turn their loyal companions into tasteful pieces of art to be remembered. Our aim is simple, to create custom pet products featuring your best friend's furry face that are aesthetically pleasing or complementary to any room. We strive to ensure you're always 100% satisfied with your purchase and if you're not, please feel free to reach out so we can make it right. Whether you want to turn your pet into a stunning modern Christmas ornament or a breathtaking throw pillow, we're the right choice for both you and your pet.

settings.title: How it Works
settings.text_1: Choose your favorite pet image(s)! Refer to our photo guide for inspiration.
settings.text_2: Our team of designers will design your pet's image into a modern work of art!
settings.text_3: After production, your customized pet product will arrive in 5-7 business days!

settings.title: We'll Take Care of You!
settings.text: We believe in our products which is why we can confidently offer a Satisfaction Guarantee. If the delivered product is defective or the design up to your expectations, please contact us to have the product reproduced or redesigned. Unfortunately due to the nature of our products being custom made, we can't offer refunds or exchanges.

settings.title: Why Choose Us?
settings.text_1:
Fast Shipping

We have streamlined our design and production process which has allowed us to provide the fastest arrival times for your completely custom pet product.

Modern Design

Our goal is to provide custom pet products that are aesthetically pleasing or easily match any décor or fit with any room.

Satisfaction Guarantee + 30 Day Money Back Guarantee

We believe in our products which is why we can confidently offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee plus a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee. If the delivered product isn't up to your expectations, please contact us
to either have the product redesigned or if you wish, a complete refund!

settings.text: Provide or take a photo in a well lit room or even better outside on a sunny day.
We suggest no accessories on the pet to better capture all their unique features.
Get close to your pet. A photo which is from the pet's head to chest works the best.
We suggest a photo of your pet sitting or standing.

settings.title: Do you create custom products for more than cats and dogs?
settings.text: Of course we do! Any pet or animal, we will create a modern custom product featuring their lovely face.

settings.title: Do you provide a preview of my product before shipment?
settings.text: We wish to get your order to you as quickly as possible which means we can't provide a preview of your product before shipment. If there are problems with the submitted photos, we will reach out to you. We recommend you view our photo guidelines. Lastly, you're protected with a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

settings.title: Can I receive a product without my pet's name?
settings.text: Of course, simply write "NO NAME" in the Pet Name box.

settings.title: Will my photo work?
settings.text: Please review our photo guidelines before submitting your photo. Remember, these are guidelines but we can work with almost any photo, just the better the photo, the better the finished product.

settings.title: Can you create pet memorials?
settings.text: Yes, of course. Please include the year or accompanying message in the Pet Name box.

settings.title: Can I edit my order after it has been submitted?
settings.text: Yes, you have 12 hours to Contact Us and request a change or edit after your order has been submitted.

settings.title: Do you include a receipt or invoice in the packaging?
settings.text: No invoices or receipts are included in our packages.

settings.title: When will I receive my order?
settings.text:
Please check each product for the individual estimated shipping times. Generally, these are the estimated transit times for each region below.

USA: 1-2 weeks.

International: 2-3 weeks.

settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.text: We ship to over 90 countries!

settings.title: What are the shipping charges?
settings.text:
All USA shipments are shipped for FREE.

For international packages, there are additional shipping charges, depends on the item but we try to keep them reasonable.

settings.title: When will I receive tracking information?
settings.text: You will receive tracking information as soon as your product is shipped out. This generally takes 1-3 days and is item dependent.

settings.title: Am I able to change my shipping address or cancel my order after it has been placed?
settings.text: Yes, you can change your shipping address or cancel your order for up to 12 hours after the order was placed.

settings.title: Will all my products arrive in the same shipment?
settings.text: If you order multiple different types of modern products, they may ship separately but at no additional cost to you.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.text: Due to our modern custom pet products being custom made, we can't offer returns/refunds. We do offer a Satisfaction Guarantee which means we will work with you until we get things right.

settings.title: What if I dislike my custom product once received?
settings.text: You're covered by our Satisfaction Guarantee. Simply contact us and we'll take care of you.

settings.title: My custom pet product arrive damaged, what do I do?
settings.text: Although extremely rare, these things do happen. If that's the case, please contact us and we will offer you a replacement 100% free of charge.

settings.title: Upload Your Pet Image
settings.text: Choose your favorite pet image(s)! Refer to our photo guide for inspiration.

settings.title: We Transform Your Pet
settings.text: Our team of designers will design your pet's image into a modern work of art!

settings.title: Cherish Your Custom Creation
settings.text: After production, your customized pet product will arrive in 5-7 business days!
